title: US State Department to bypass congressional review period to ... - Reddit
body: 34M subscribers in the worldnews community. A place for major news from around the world, excluding US-internal news.
readable_content:
- Im__Bruce_Wayne__AMA (2023-12-07): US State Department to bypass congressional review period to send thousands of munitions to Israel Politics
- Stankmcduke (2023-12-07): They going to do that for Ukraine too?
- Lord_Saddler4 (2023-12-07): No sadly, supporting Israel no matter what is the only thing the democrats and republicans agree on.
- pompcaldor (2023-12-07): Israel is a major non-NATO ally. Ukraine is not, yet.
- labink (2023-12-07): What about Ukraine? They are more in need? They are fighting a greater evil.
- Ilookupsometimes2 (2023-12-07): I mean Russia and Hamas are both bad but Hamas did openly vow to exterminate every Jew which is pretty bad
- flossdaily (2023-12-07): Man, it is great to see the United States government being on the right side of this thing.
- MangledJingleJangle (2023-12-08): Who is going to provide munitions to all of these wars if we stop? Great move on the state department if you ask me.
